clinical_study.brief_title: Otologic and Rhinologic Outcomes in Children With Clef Palate
clinical_study.official_title: Otologic and Rhinologic Outcomes in Children With Cleft Palate at Age 10 Years

brief_summary.textblock:
OBJECTIVE:
To compare otologic and rhinologic outcomes in patients with cleft palate according to surgical protocols and type of cleft.
DESIGN:
Monocentric retrospective and prospective analysis of medical reports.
PATIENTS, PARTICIPANTS:
All consecutively treated patients affected by a cleft palate, born between December 2006 and December 2009 and followed in the Montpellier University Hospital, at the age of 10 years.
INTERVENTIONS:
Results of audiometry, tympanometry, otoscopy, tubomanometry and rhinomanometry and orofacial tomodensitometry done at the age of 10 were evaluated.
MAIN OUTCOME MEASURE(S):
The history of ventilation tubes inserted, and the results at the EDTQ test were analyzed.

secondary_outcome.description: Nasal ventilation will be assessed with passive anterior rhinomanometry
Eustachian tube function will be assessed with tubomanometry

Facial 3D scan will be used to measure 2 criteria : Total volum of the mastoid Total volum of the mastoid's cells (pneumatization) Facial 3D scan will be used to measure 2 criteria : Total volum of the mastoid Total volum of the mastoid's cells (pneumatization) Facial 3D scan will be used to measure 2 criteria : Total volum of the mastoid Total volum of the mastoid's cells (pneumatization)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Children with Cleft lip and palate
arm_group.description: Children with Cleft lip and palate

study_pop.textblock: All consecutively treated patients affected by a cleft lip and palate or a cleft palate, born between December 2006 and December 2009 and followed in the Montpellier University Hospital, at the age of 10 years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria :
- 10 yo children with operated clefts followed in the universitary hospital of Montpellier
- who went to the ENT check up
Exclusion criteria :
- Thoses who skip the check up
